WorkItem.Description:
Hello...I was getting this error when trying to use Irony inside a solution that had a key generated for another project.  Apparently, if you try to mix key-signed with not signed assemblies you get this.  

I generated a key for Irony on my local copy and it was fixed but you might want to generate a key for Irony and check it into the subversion.
WorkItem.Summary: Assembly generation failed -- Referenced assembly 'Irony' does not have a strong name

Comments.Message: thanks for pointing to this, will give it a thought
